constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 95 (Tuesday, June 1, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. ISSA:
H.R. 3664.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8, clause 8, ``to promote the Progress
of Science and useful Arts, by securing for limited Times to
Authors and Inventors the exclusive Rights to their
respective Writings and Discoveries,''
[Page H2686]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Courts, Intellectual Property, and the Internet.

title: SMART Act
